content: half_double_crochet double_crochet x 2 half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch x 5 single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet x 2 half_double_crochet single_crochet x 3 then work down final side single_crochet in same stitch as last single_crochet single_crochet x 2 fasten_off and weave tail 4 | p age front horn cream 1 3 single_crochet in magic_ring 3 2 increase x 3 6 3 single_crochet x 6 6 4 single_crochet increase x 3 9 5-6 single_crochet x 9 9 finish off and leave tail for weaving rear horns cream make 2 1 3 single_crochet in magic_ring 3 2 increase x 3 6 3-4 single_crochet x 6 6 5 single_crochet increase x 3 9 6-7 single_crochet x 9 9 8 single_crochet x 4 increase single_crochet x 4 10 9 single_crochet x 10 10 finish off and leave tail for weaving tail green 1 5 single_crochet in magic_ring 5 2 single_crochet x 5 5 3 increase x 5 10 4 single_crochet x 10 10 5 single_crochet increase x 5 15 6-8 single_crochet x 15 15 finish off and leave tail for weaving assembly 1 head weave tapestry needle through stitches on final round pull to close sew to body 2 horns sew to head stuff when ¾ around the front horn is sewn between rounds 8- 11 the rear horns between rounds 15-18 4 stiches apart 3 collar sew evenly across the top of the head 4 arms sew to body between rounds 33- 35 5 tail sew to body between rounds 19-24 5 | p age that s it enjoy your tony 6 | p age
